topic.title: Anyone need a book? My Conspiracy, Spirituality Book Store!
topic.body:
http://www.lulu.com/spotlight/fratersh  About Saderingrad Production

Welcome to Saderingrad Productions ! We specialize in spiritual books, comic books and old public domain books that have long been forgotten. We also have done artwork for war history books and fiction based works. We recommend our Ethiopic Holy Bible Volume 1 that is quite popular and attempts to bring the Book of Enoch back into the Bibles list of books. The Ethiopic Holy Bible Volume 1 also has a few selections from Josephus a Jewish historian and also the book has Jubilees and the Apocrypha which is also available in Catholic Bibles.

Frater S.H. is an esoteric researcher who is out to reveal ancient knowledge, both known and forbidden. Frater S.H. has appeared on Joshua P. Warren's "Speaking of Strange", Kevin Smith's Show (UFO show), and Ghost Chronicles International with Ron Klerk and Richard Felix (The historian from Most Haunted on the Travel Channel).
